UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Updates the applied scopes of the `Reservation`.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetReservationDetails
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: List the reservations and the roll up counts of reservations group by provisioning states that the user has access to in the current tenant.

OtherOperations.Name: GetAvailableScopes
OtherOperations.Description: Check whether the scopes from request is valid for `Reservation`.

OtherOperations.Name: Archive
OtherOperations.Description: Archiving a `Reservation` moves it to `Archived` state.

OtherOperations.Name: Unarchive
OtherOperations.Description: Restores a `Reservation` to the state it was before archiving.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Purchase `ReservationOrder` and create resource under the specified URI.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Purchase `ReservationOrder` and create resource under the specified URI.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: List of all the `ReservationOrder`s that the user has access to in the current tenant.

OtherOperations.Name: SplitReservation
OtherOperations.Description: Split a `Reservation` into two `Reservation`s with specified quantity distribution.

OtherOperations.Name: MergeReservation
OtherOperations.Description: Merge the specified `Reservation`s into a new `Reservation`. The two `Reservation`s being merged must have same properties.

OtherOperations.Name: ChangeDirectory
OtherOperations.Description: Change directory (tenant) of `ReservationOrder` and all `Reservation` under it to specified tenant id

OtherOperations.Name: CalculateRefund
OtherOperations.Description: Calculate price for returning `Reservations` if there are no policy errors.

OtherOperations.Name: Return
OtherOperations.Description: Return a reservation and get refund information.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Get the current quota (service limit) and usage of a resource. You can use the response from the GET operation to submit quota update request.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description:
Create or update the quota (service limits) of a resource to the requested value.
 Steps:
  1. Make the Get request to get the quota information for specific resource.
  2. To increase the quota, update the limit field in the response from Get request to new value.
  3. Submit the JSON to the quota request API to update the quota.
  The Create quota request may be constructed as follows. The PUT operation can be used to update the quota.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description:
Update the quota (service limits) of this resource to the requested value.
  • To get the quota information for specific resource, send a GET request.
  • To increase the quota, update the limit field from the GET response to a new value.
  • To update the quota value, submit the JSON response to the quota request API to update the quota.
  • To update the quota. use the PATCH operation.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Gets a list of current quotas (service limits) and usage for all resources. The response from the list quota operation can be leveraged to request quota updates.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: For the specified Azure region (location), get the details and status of the quota request by the quota request ID for the resources of the resource provider. The PUT request for the quota (service limit) returns a response with the requestId parameter.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: For the specified Azure region (location), subscription, and resource provider, get the history of the quota requests for the past year. To select specific quota requests, use the oData filter.
